artist: Artist: Bram van Velde; Author: Pierre Alechinsky; Author: Daniel Abadie; Publisher: Maeght Éditeur, Paris
description: periodical with abstract image on cover in orange, maroon, pink, white and black; title across top center; author across bottom; 28 loose pages as issued; includes 3 original ( incl. cover) lithographs by Bram van Velde with 7 color illustrations; text in French by Pierre Alechinsky; lender's archive # 121
image_copyright: © Daniel Abadie and Bram van Velde %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
medium: Color lithographs and color illustrations; letterpress
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Derrière le Miroir, No. 240
